note:
Welcome to my channel, ctrl-alt-rees! I'm Rees. Obviously.

I restore, repair, upgrade, modify and maintain all of retro computers and consoles in my collection myself and I'm keen to share not only the process but the end results. I also do a bit of retro game collecting on the side as well as putting out the odd educational or computer history video, as well as electronics tutorials and reviews of gadgets and retrospectives of my favourite retro games.

If you're interested in learning more about computer and gaming history and how to really get the most out of your retro systems why not give my channel a subscribe? I'm currently aiming to release at least one video per week covering whatever I'm currently tinkering with.

I also have a website over at https://ctrl-alt-rees.com.
Join me as I fumble around the innards of 40-year-old tech. Relax, put your feet up and watch me build and fix stuff.
Fun with retro computers and electronics
Hi I'm Jan. I repair/hack/make/destroy stuff on camera. Electronics, Repair, Tinkering, Retrocomputing, VintageAudio. As unprofessional as it gets.
